resources.string: eat_easy
Hello blank fragment

- This is the first bullet point
- This is the second bullet point
- This is the third bullet point

Ingredients:-
 
 - 200g Paneer (cut into cubes)
 - 2 tbsp Butter
 - 1 tbsp Oil
 - 1 Bay Leaf
 - 2-3 Cloves
 - 1-inch Cinnamon Stick
 - 2-3 Cardamom Pods
 - 1 Large Onion (finely chopped)
 - 2-3 Tomatoes (pureed)
 - 1 tsp Ginger-Garlic Paste
 - 1 tsp Red Chili Powder
 - 1/2 tsp Turmeric Powder
 - 1 tsp Coriander Powder
 - 1/2 tsp Garam Masala
 - 1/4 cup Fresh Cream
 - Salt to taste
 - 1 tbsp Kasuri Methi (dried fenugreek leaves, crushed)
 - Coriander Leaves for garnish
 - 1 tsp Sugar (optional)
 
 Instructions:-
 
 - Heat butter and oil in a pan. Add bay leaf, cloves, cinnamon, and cardamom.Sauté until fragrant.
 - Add chopped onions and cook until golden brown.
 - Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for 1-2 minutes.
 - Stir in tomato puree and cook until the oil separates from the masala.
 - Add red chili powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder, and salt. 
 - Cook for a few minutes until the spices are well combined.
 - Add paneer cubes and mix gently to coat them with the masala.
 - Add fresh cream and sugar (optional). Stir well to combine.
 - Sprinkle garam masala and kasuri methi. 
 - Mix well and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
 - Garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot with naan, roti, or rice.
 
 Enjoy your delicious Paneer Butter Masala!

Ingredients:-
 
 - 2 cups chickpeas (soaked overnight and cooked)
 - 2 tbsp oil
 - 1 large onion (finely chopped)
 - 2 tomatoes (pureed)
 - 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste
 - 1 green chili (finely chopped, optional)
 - 1 tsp cumin seeds
 - 1 tsp turmeric powder
 - 1 tsp coriander powder
 - 1 tsp garam masala
 - 1 tsp chili powder (adjust to taste)
 - 1 tsp amchur (dried mango powder) or lemon juice
 - Salt to taste
 - Fresh cilantro for garnish
 
 Instructions:-
 
 - Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds, and let them sizzle.
 - Add chopped onions and sauté until golden brown.
 - Stir in ginger-garlic paste and green chili, cook for a minute.
 - Add tomato puree and cook until the oil separates from the mixture.
 - Mix in turmeric, coriander powder, garam masala, and chili powder. Cook for a few minutes.
 - Add cooked chickpeas and some of the chickpea cooking liquid (or water) to the pan. Simmer for 10-15 minutes.
 - Stir in amchur or lemon juice, and adjust salt.
 - Garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.
 
 Enjoy your Chole with rice or bread!

Ingredients:- 
 
 - 250g bhindi (okra), sliced
 - 2 tbsp oil
 - 1 tsp cumin seeds
 - 1 large onion, finely chopped
 - 1 tomato, chopped
 - 1 tsp ginger-garlic paste
 - 1 green chili, finely chopped (optional)
 - 1 tsp turmeric powder
 - 1 tsp coriander powder
 - 1 tsp cumin powder
 - 1/2 tsp red chili powder
 - 1/2 tsp garam masala
 - Salt to taste
 - Fresh cilantro for garnish
 
 Instructions:- 
 
 - Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds, and let them sizzle.
 - Add onions and sauté until golden brown.
 - Stir in ginger-garlic paste and green chili, cook for a minute.
 - Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they soften.
 - Mix in turmeric, coriander powder, cumin powder, red chili powder, and salt. Cook for a few minutes.
 - Add sliced bhindi and cook on medium heat, stirring occasionally, until bhindi is tender and lightly browned.
 - Sprinkle garam masala and mix well.
 - Garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.
 
 Enjoy your masala bhindi!

Ingredients:- 
 
 - Basmati rice
 - Mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, potatoes, etc.)
 - Onion, sliced
 - Tomato, chopped
 - Ginger-garlic paste
 - Biryani masala
 - Yogurt
 - Saffron or turmeric
 - Ghee or oil
 - Fresh coriander and mint
 
 Instructions:- 
 
 - Cook basmati rice until 70% done.
 - Sauté onions, ginger-garlic paste, and vegetables in ghee.
 - Add chopped tomatoes, yogurt, and biryani masala. Cook until vegetables are tender.
 - Layer the partially cooked rice over the vegetable mixture.
 - Sprinkle saffron or turmeric, cilantro, and mint on top.
 - Cover and cook on low heat until rice is fully done.
 
 Enjoy your veg biryani!

Ingredients:- 
 
 - Boiled potatoes, cubed
 - Cumin seeds
 - Turmeric powder
 - Red chili powder
 - Salt
 - Oil
 - Fresh coriander
 
 Instructions:- 
 
 - Heat oil, add cumin seeds, and let them splutter.
 - Add cubed potatoes, turmeric, red chili powder, and salt.
 - Sauté until potatoes are crispy and well-coated with spices.
 - Garnish with fresh cilantro.
 
 Enjoy your jeera aloo!

Ingredients:- 
 
 - Cooked lentils (toor dal)
 - Onion, chopped
 - Tomato, chopped
 - Ginger-garlic paste
 - Green chili, chopped
 - Turmeric powder
 - Cumin seeds
 - Mustard seeds
 - Ghee or oil
 - Fresh cilantro
 
 Instructions:- 
 
 - Heat ghee, add cumin and mustard seeds, and let them splutter.
 - Sauté onions, ginger-garlic paste, and green chili until golden.
 - Add tomatoes, turmeric, and cook until soft.
 - Pour this tadka over cooked lentils and mix well.
 - Garnish with fresh coriander.
 
 Enjoy your dal tadka!

Ingredients :- 
 
 - 12 lasagna noodles 
 - 1 lb (450g) ground beef 
 - 1 onion, chopped 
 - 2 cups marinara sauce 
 - 15 oz (425g) ricotta cheese 
 - 1 egg 
 - 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese 
 - 3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese 
 - Salt and pepper to taste 
 

Instructions :- 
 
 - Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C) 
 - Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions 
 - Brown ground beef with chopped onion 
 - Add marinara sauce to beef, simmer for 10 minutes 
 - In a bowl, mix ricotta cheese with egg and Parmesan cheese 
 - In a baking dish, spread a thin layer of meat sauce 
 - Layer noodles, ricotta mixture, meat sauce, and shredded mozzarella 
 - Repeat layers until all ingredients are used 
 - Top with a final layer of noodles and meat sauce 
 - Sprinkle extra mozzarella and Parmesan on top 
 - Cover with foil and bake for 25 minutes 
 - Remove foil and bake for an additional 25 minutes 
 - Let it cool for 10 minutes before serving 
 
 Enjoy your dal Lasagania !

Ingredients :- 
 
 - 8 or (225g) pasta (penne, spaghetti, or your choice) 
 - 2 cups tomato puree 
 - 1 onion, finely chopped 
 - 4 garlic cloves, minced 
 - 1/2 tsp red chili flakes 
 - 1/2 tsp dried oregano 
 - 1/2 tsp dried basil 
 - 2 tbsp olive oil 
 - Salt and pepper to taste 
 - Fresh basil leaves for garnish 
 - Grated Parmesan cheese for garnish 
 
 Instructions :- 
 
 - Cook pasta according to package instructions 
 - Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat 
 - Sauté chopped onion until translucent 
 - Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant 
 - Add tomato puree, red chili flakes, oregano, and basil 
 - Simmer sauce for 10-15 minutes until thickened 
 - Season with salt and pepper to taste 
 - Add cooked pasta to the sauce and toss to coat evenly 
 - Garnish with fresh basil leaves and grated Parmesan cheese 
 
 Enjoy your Red Sauce Pasta !

Ingredients :-
 
 - 4 burger buns 
 - 2 large potatoes, boiled and mashed 
 - 1 carrot, grated 
 - 1/2 cup green peas, boiled 
 - 1/4 cup corn kernels, boiled 
 - 1/2 tsp red chili powder 
 - 1/2 tsp garam masala 
 - Salt to taste 
 - 2 tbsp breadcrumbs 
 - 4 slices of cheese 
 - 4 lettuce leaves 
 - 1 tomato, sliced 
 - 1 onion, sliced 
 - 2 tbsp mayonnaise 
 - 2 tbsp ketchup 
 - 2 tbsp oil for shallow frying 
 
 Instructions :- 
 - In a bowl, mix mashed potatoes, grated carrot, green peas, and corn 
 - Add red chili powder, garam masala, and salt 
 - Add breadcrumbs and mix well to form a dough 
 - Shape the mixture into 4 patties 
 - Heat oil in a pan and shallow fry patties until golden brown on both sides 
 - Toast burger buns in the same pan until slightly crispy 
 - Spread mayonnaise and ketchup on the buns 
 - Place a lettuce leaf on the bottom bun, followed by a patty 
 - Add a slice of cheese on top of the patty 
 - Top with tomato and onion slices 
 - Cover with the top bun 
 
 Enjoy your Veg. Cheese Burger !

Ingredients :- 
 
 - 8 or (225g) spaghetti 
 - 2 cups marinara sauce 
 - 3 garlic cloves, minced 
 - 1/4 cup olive oil 
 - 1/2 tsp red chili flakes (optional) 
 - Salt to taste 
 - Fresh basil leaves for garnish 
 - Grated Parmesan cheese for garnish 
 
 Instructions :- 
 
 - Cook spaghetti according to package instructions 
 - Drain and set aside 
 - Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat 
 - Sauté minced garlic until fragrant 
 - Add red chili flakes and marinara sauce 
 - Simmer sauce for 10 minutes 
 - Season with salt to taste 
 - Add cooked spaghetti to the sauce and toss to coat evenly 
 - Garnish with fresh basil leaves and grated Parmesan cheese 
 
 Enjoy your Spaghetti !

Ingredients :- 
 
 - 8 or (225g) pasta (penne, rotini, or your choice) 
 - 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved 
 - 1 cucumber, diced 
 - 1/2 red onion, finely chopped 
 - 1/2 cup black olives, sliced 
 - 1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled 
 - 1/4 cup Italian dressing 
 - 1 tbsp olive oil 
 - Salt and pepper to taste 
 - Fresh basil leaves for garnish 
 
 Instructions :- 
 - Cook pasta according to package instructions 
 - Drain and rinse under cold water 
 - In a large bowl, combine cooked pasta, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and black olives 
 - Drizzle olive oil and Italian dressing over the salad 
 - Toss to coat all ingredients evenly 
 - Season with salt and pepper to taste 
 - Add crumbled feta cheese on top 
 - Garnish with fresh basil leaves 
 - Serve chilled 
 Enjoy your Pasta Salad !

Ingredients :- 
 
 - 1 pizza base (store-bought or homemade) 
 - 1/2 cup pizza sauce 
 - 1 cup mozzarella cheese, shredded 
 - 1/2 bell pepper, sliced 
 - 1/2 onion, sliced 
 - 1/4 cup sweet corn kernels 
 - 1/4 cup black olives, sliced 
 - 1/4 cup mushrooms, sliced 
 - 1/2 tsp red chili flakes 
 - 1/2 tsp dried oregano 
 - Fresh basil leaves for garnish 
 - Olive oil for drizzling 
 
 Instructions :- 
 
 - Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C) 
 - Place the pizza base on a baking tray 
 - Spread pizza sauce evenly over the base 
 - Sprinkle shredded mozzarella cheese over the sauce 
 - Arrange bell pepper, onion, sweet corn, black olives, and mushrooms on top 
 - Sprinkle red chili flakes and dried oregano 
 - Drizzle a little olive oil on top 
 - Bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes until the cheese is melted and bubbly 
 - Garnish with fresh basil leaves 
 - Slice and serve hot 
 
 Enjoy your Veg. Chesse Pizza !

Ingredients :- 
 
 - 500g ground beef (80% lean, 20% fat) 
 - Salt to taste 
 - Black pepper to taste 
 - 4 hamburger buns 
 - 4 slices of cheddar cheese (optional) 
 - Lettuce leaves 
 - Tomato slices 
 - Onion slices 
 - Pickles (optional) 
 - Ketchup, mustard, or mayo (optional) 
 - 1 tbsp oil or butter (for cooking) 
 
 Instructions :- 
 
 - Mix ground beef with salt and pepper. 
 - Shape into 4 patties. 
 - Cook in a skillet with oil or butter for 3-4 minutes per side. Add cheese in the last minute if desired. 
 - Toast buns in the skillet until golden. 
 - Layer lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles on the bottom bun. Add the patty, condiments, and top with the other bun. 
 
 Enjoy your Hamburger !

Ingredients :- 
 
 Crust : 
 
 - 2 1/2 cups flour 
 - 1 cup butter 
 - 1/4 cup sugar 
 - 1/4 tsp salt 
 - Ice water 
 
 Filling : 
 
 - 6 cups apples 
 - 3/4 cup granulated sugar 
 - 1/4 cup brown sugar 
 - 1/4 cup flour 
 - 1 tsp cinnamon 
 - 1 tbsp lemon juice 
 - 1 beaten egg 
 - Sugar (for sprinkling) 
 
 Instructions :- 
 
 - Mix flour, butter, sugar, salt. Add ice water. Chill. 
 - Mix apples with sugars, flour, cinnamon, lemon juice. 
 - Fill pie dish with dough, add filling, top with dough, seal, brush with egg, sprinkle sugar. 
 - Bake at 425°F (220°C) for 45-55 minutes. Cool before serving. 
 
 Enjoy your Apple Pie !

Ingredients :- 
 
 - 1 cup cornmeal 
 - 1 cup all-purpose flour 
 - 1/4 cup sugar 
 - 1 tbsp baking powder 
 - 1/2 tsp salt 
 - 1 cup milk 
 - 2 eggs 
 - 1/4 cup melted butter 
 
 Instructions :- 
 
 - In a Bowl Combine cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. 
 - Whisk together milk, eggs, and melted butter. 
 - Stir wet ingredients into dry ingredients until just mixed. 
 - Pour batter into a greased pan. Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 20-25 minutes, or until golden and a toothpick comes out clean. 
 
 Enjoy your Cornbread !

Ingredients :- 
 
 - 1 cup all-purpose flour 
 - 2 tbsp sugar 
 - 1 tbsp baking powder 
 - 1/2 tsp salt 
 - 1 cup milk 
 - 1 egg 
 - 2 tbsp melted butter 
 - 1 tsp vanilla extract (optional) 
 
 Instructions :- 
 
 - Mix dry ingredients In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. 
 - Mix wet ingredients In another bowl, whisk together milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract (if using). 
 - Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients.
 Stir until just combined some lumps are okay. 
 - Heat a non-stick skillet or griddle over medium heat. Pour 1/4 cup batter per pancake. Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden brown. 
 
 Enjoy your Pancakes with your favorite toppings!

Ingredients :- 
 
 - 4 hot dog sausages 
 - 4 hot dog buns 
 - Mustard and ketchup (to taste) 
 - Optional toppings: diced onions, relish, sauerkraut, pickles 
 - 1 tbsp oil (for grilling) 
 
 Instructions :- 
 
 - Heat oil in a skillet or grill pan over medium heat. 
 Cook sausages, turning occasionally, until heated through and browned. 
 - Lightly toast buns in the same skillet or on a grill. 
 - Place a cooked sausage in each bun. Add mustard, ketchup, and any optional toppings. 
 
 Enjoy your Hot Dogs !

Ingredients :- 
 
 - 8 oz (about 2 cups) elbow macaroni 
 - 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese 
 - 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese 
 - 2 cups milk 
 - 2 tbsp butter 
 - 2 tbsp all-purpose flour 
 - 1/2 tsp salt 
 - 1/4 tsp black pepper 
 - 1/4 tsp paprika (optional) 
 - 1/2 cup breadcrumbs (optional, for topping) 
 - 1 tbsp melted butter (optional, for topping) 
 
 Instructions :- 
 
 - Boil macaroni according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. 
 - In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Stir in flour and cook for 1 minute.
 Gradually whisk in milk and cook until sauce thickens. 
 - Remove from heat and stir in cheddar and mozzarella cheeses until melted and smooth.
 Season with salt, pepper, and paprika. 
 - Mix cooked macaroni with the cheese sauce. 
 - For a crunchy top, mix breadcrumbs with melted butter and sprinkle over the macaroni. Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 20 minutes or until bubbly and golden. 
 
 Enjoy your Macaroni and Cheese !
